text.content:
Spinning Swing

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.

Melee

Nicked

You take @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1.success].

Ranged

Twisted Up

You are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Encumbered]{Encumbered} until you spend 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Interact]{Interact} actions to free yourself.

Unarmed

Apprentice Move

Reroll the attack roll, targeting the creature closest to the target (excluding yourself).

Spell
